title: Can we report bad/suspicious matchmaking still?
body:
I remember way back in the day that Riot had a way to report a game that you feel had bad or suspicious matchmaking. Is there still a way to do this?

I found the old thread: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1827767 Does Riot still use that e-mail to collect data?

Thanks for your help.

replies.body: Can we report that we can't have a single balanced game because the system intentionally forces one team to win and one to lose? ;)

Seeing as that post was from about 5 years ago, I think it might be safe to say that they are no longer accepting emails for that purpose. I'm curious as to what "bad matchmaking" you're referring to though!

The big thing that stuck out to me was that in this single game everyone on the enemy team was from the same club, appeared to be a premade 5 group playing against my team which had  the jungle (me) and the support duo queued. I asked if the other 3 members of our team were a trio, but they said they were not.

I thought the matchmaker paired full 5 player teams with other full 5 teams, so I wanted to report the match incase something was broken or fishy.
